name: Freezing Point
description:
Freezing Point is a short survival game set on a small Antarctic island.

Stranded, you must find a radio tower on the island in order to contact help.

Will you avoid freezing to death?

Made as a final project for Harvard's CS50 Course.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

Mouse - Look around

Shift - Sprint

Enter - Open / Interact
